item.title: Anyone got ages of empires the conquers or the ages of kings?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“cant touch this93, post:4, topic:84063”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=123488.msg1208107#msg1208107 date=1177394365]
Get Age of Empires 3, the latest instalment pretty good game. No locking gates though.
[/quote]

Gah i hate thta…all ur friken men run all about trying to figure out who to kill because some worker walks by your gate…

Age of empires moden world is pretty good. Goes from midevil age to WWII. Gots planes tanks and all that good stuff[/quote]

It might not be a WWII theme, Sandy(the developer of AOE3 expansion The War Chiefs) said they might do another ancient time game first, and that the AOE3 team are producing 2 games at once, and don’t forget they’re making halo wars.

I know the book had a WWI/2 Theme then a space theme.

7) Is ES capable of designing 2 entirely different games at the same time A – we’re doing it right now, and neither team seems to show signs of stress. This is a first for ES by the way. 13) If an Age of Empires was made that repeated Age of Empires 1 time period, would you consider it a step backwards? A – Age of Empires was released 10 years ago. I think the world might, by now, be ready for another strategy game based in ancient times.

Read full topic
